data.name: 武儒绘卷 - 天地奇缘 富豪模式扩展包
data.detailed_description: DLC for Wuru scroll Rich man Mode.
data.about_the_game: DLC for Wuru scroll Rich man Mode.
data.short_description: "Wuru Painting Scroll - Romance of Heaven and Earth" is a development game with a mythological background. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or defend their homeland and the country, fight in all directions, or seek wisdom and courage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 940+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supported DirectSound DirectX 9.0c
